text:
My dream is to empower women
in patriarchal societies.

I want them to take control
of their bodies and lives.

I want to help women from
underprivileged backgrounds

to realize that
they have a choice

to make their lives better
without relying on men.

That with determination
and hard work,

I want every parent to be aware
of the importance of educating

their children as equals and
generate the same opportunities

for them, regardless
of their gender.

I want to leave this place
a more just place for women.

My dream is to see the next
generation of women in Morocco

aspire to be the new
leaders of the country.
